meanings.sent1: After a long day, she finally retired to her cozy bedchamber.
meanings.sent2: The bedchamber was decorated in calming colors to promote restful sleep.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the bedchamber was its own personal playground.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams took her to far-off lands beyond the walls of her bedchamber.
meanings.sent5: The bedchamber was filled with the soft scent of lavender, lulling her into a peaceful slumber.

meanings.definition: The private room in which a person sleeps.
meanings.sent1: He locked the door to his bedchamber for privacy.
meanings.sent2: The king's bedchamber was adorned with luxurious tapestries and furniture.
meanings.sent3: The bedchamber was so quiet that even a pin drop could be heard.
meanings.sent4: In his bedchamber, he found solace from the chaos of the outside world.
meanings.sent5: The bedchamber held secrets whispered only to the night.
